attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Funding Nursing home fees privatley cost between £600 and £1200 per WEEK, yes per week! That means £31,200 - £62,000 per YEAR, to be paid by the person recieving care unless you have have assets of less than £21,000 (including you home) in England and Northern Ireland (£21,500 in Wales and £20,000 in Scotland). 
The elderly who go into a nursing home are usually are diabled, ill or have dementia, they can not look after themselves, they need nursing and specialist care. Private funders do however recieve a sum per month (on average £87 per week from the government for Nursing care, which is not deducted from the above fees and  is paid directly to the home.
I believe that everyone who is in a nursing home should not have to pay any care home fees at all.
Do you????
I want the government to look into the funding of nursing home fees and consider abolishing them. I also want to look at tax breaks for self funders, bring all care home fees in line with what the council pay which is around £350 per week. Open up this debate and support this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
